li.label: morphed
li.description: I'm slimy, and my mouth waters upsettingly every time I see a dead thing.

li.label: morphed
li.description: It's slime time, baby!

li.label: morphed
li.description: Helixiens are disgusting enough as it is, now I have to see one every time I look in the mirror!

li.label: morphed
li.description: I'm kind of digging the wild field of vision, but people keep making salt jokes around me.

li.label: reverted
li.description: I'm dry again, and my eyes are back where nature intended.

li.label: reverted
li.description: Eugh, corpses smell so bad now, and my skin feels so dry!

li.label: reverted
li.description: No more wool! Oh, skin, how I missed seeing you...

li.label: reverted
li.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.

li.label: Slug face
li.description: Eugh, the way these eyestalks swing around makes me feel queasy.

li.label: Slug face
li.description: I can see forever!

li.label: Slug face
li.description: Nobody is gonna want to kiss this face! And with this rasping tongue I don't blame them!

li.label: Slug tail
li.description: Do you have any idea how much lint gets stuck to this thing?

li.label: Slug tail
li.description: Scientifically speaking it's actually a large foot, but either way I can surf around on slime with it. Kowabunga!

li.label: Slug tail
li.description: There's a loathesome bag of goo growing out of me, how do you think I feel?

li.label: Slimy skin
li.description: The leopard spots are kinda nice, but the slime? Not so much.

li.label: Slimy skin
li.description: It's awesome how the slight shines through the translucent surface, like slimy stained glass!

li.label: Slimy skin
li.description: Oh god, this is one worse than leprosy!

li.label: soaking wet (lubricated)
li.description: I'm soaking wet. This feels so good.

li.label: observed corpse, yummy
li.description: I saw a dead body laying on the ground. It was mouth-watering.

li.label: observed rotting corpse, yummy
li.description: I saw a rotting corpse laying on the ground. I want to feast on its rotten entrails and slurp its delicious corpse juice.

li.label: witnessed ally's death
li.description: I saw one of my people die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next. I wonder if they'll let me gently nibble their corpse...

li.label: witnessed outsider's death
li.description: I saw someone die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next. Uh... Is anyone going to eat that?

li.label: colonist left unburied
li.description: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. I wonder if they'll let me alone enough time to sneak around and feast on the corpse...
